directions: In a large bowl, toss together the salad greens, carrot, green onions, strawberries, raspberries, garlic, walnuts, almond slices, currants and feta cheese. Divide between two salad bowls. Top each bowl with some croutons and serve with vinaigrette dressing.
ingredients: 1/2 cup herbed vinaigrette salad dressing, or to taste
title: Romance-in-a-Bowl Salad
